results.title: Bitcoin at Historic Highs: 3 Critical Levels to Watch Now
results.description: BTC rose to a record high of over $125,000 Sunday, extending the weekly gain to 11.5%.
results.author: Omkar Godbole

results.title: DOGE Rallies 3% Back Above $0.26 as Traders Target $0.30
results.description: Analysts note ascending channel formations and breakout targets toward $0.30–$0.40 if current support holds.
results.author: Shaurya Malwa

results.title: XRP Surges Above $3, Traders Eye Move to $4, on Fresh Bitcoin Highs
results.description: Traders now view the $3.10–$3.30 range as the key battleground, with breakout projections targeting $4.00–$4.20 if momentum accelerates.
results.author: Shaurya Malwa

results.title: Bitcoin Surges to Record High Above $125K After $3.2B in Spot BTC Inflows
results.description: The U.S.-listed spot ETFs registered a net inflow of $3.24 billion in the week ended Oct. 3.
results.author: Omkar Godbole

results.title: Bitcoin's Key Trends Suggest Price Still Has Plenty of Room to Run
results.description: Despite some investors calling Q4 the end of the cycle, key long-term indicators suggest the bull market may just be getting started.
results.author: James Van Straten

results.title: ‘Solana Is the New Wall Street,’ Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan Explains
results.description: Hougan said Solana’s speed, throughput and finality make it “extraordinarily attractive” for those choosing which blockchain to invest in.
results.author: Siamak Masnavi

results.title: State of Crypto: What Happens to Crypto if Government Shutdown Lingers
results.description: A short-term shutdown probably won't hurt crypto's efforts in D.C. much. A long-lasting one? That's less clear.
results.author: Nikhilesh De

results.title: Investing in ‘Uptober’? Brazil's Largest Investment Bank's Crypto Arm Names 5 Token Picks
results.description: The bank's crypto platform, Mynt, cites institutional demand, network security, and real-world use cases as reasons for its picks.
results.author: Francisco Rodrigues

results.title: Walmart-Backed OnePay to Add Bitcoin and Ether Trading to Finance App: CNBC
results.description: The service will be powered by Zerohash, and will put OnePay in line with competitors like Venmo, Cash App, and PayPal.
results.author: Francisco Rodrigues

results.title: Brazil’s Mercado Bitcoin Bets on ‘Invisible Blockchain’ Approach to Build Financial Super App
results.description: The company plans on using blockchain technology behind the scenes while avoiding crypto-native terminology.
results.author: Francisco Rodrigues
